frontmatter.title: Getting Started
frontmatter.summary: Learn how to use this package for communicating with our APIs

children.value: is a class that wraps a provided http service with helper functions.
Automatic polling of restful endpoints with timeouts
Simple URI builder for API resources
Life-cycle hooks into HTTP calls for GET, PUT, POST, and DELETE
